languages.text: {n}Паскаль делает благословляющий жест, и многие среди ваших подданных, просияв, повторяют его — техноматы в промасленных робах, скрипящие по свиткам пальцами-автоперьями чиновники, выставляющие напоказ дорогие {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугментации{/g} аристократы. На столь цивилизованном мире, как Даргонус, многие чтят Омниссию и его служителей.{/n}

{n}Pasqal sketches a blessing in the air, and many of your subjects, wearing beatific smiles, copy it — technomats in grease-stained robes, bureaucrats scratching at scrolls with autoquill fingers, and aristocrats flaunting their costly {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g}. On a world as civilised as Dargonus there are many who honour the Omnissiah and His priests.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль делает благословляющий жест, и многие среди ваших подданных, просияв, повторяют его — техноматы в промасленных робах, скрипящие по свиткам пальцами-автоперьями чиновники, выставляющие напоказ дорогие {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугментации{/g} аристократы. На столь цивилизованном мире, как Даргонус, многие чтят Омниссию и его служителей.{/n}

languages.text: {n}パスカルが祈りを宙に描くと、恍惚とした表情でその動きをまねるのは多くの臣下たち――油しみのついたローブに包まれたテクノマット、自動針の指で巻物に書き殴っていく官僚、そして金をかけた{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}増強手術{/g}を見せびらかす貴族たちだ。ダルゴナスと同等に文明化が進んだ星なら、多くの者が万機神とその司祭の祝福を受ける。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal sketches a blessing in the air, and many of your subjects, wearing beatific smiles, copy it — technomats in grease-stained robes, bureaucrats scratching at scrolls with autoquill fingers, and aristocrats flaunting their costly {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g}. On a world as civilised as Dargonus there are many who honour the Omnissiah and His priests.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルが祈りを宙に描くと、恍惚とした表情でその動きをまねるのは多くの臣下たち――油しみのついたローブに包まれたテクノマット、自動針の指で巻物に書き殴っていく官僚、そして金をかけた{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}増強手術{/g}を見せびらかす貴族たちだ。ダルゴナスと同等に文明化が進んだ星なら、多くの者が万機神とその司祭の祝福を受ける。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡在空中划着祝福的图案，你的众多臣民也面露微笑，有样学样地描画起来。他们之中有穿着油污长袍的技工，有挥舞着自动羽毛笔在卷轴上奋笔疾书的官员，还有有意炫耀着自己昂贵{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}的达官贵人。在达戈努斯这样的文明世界，许多人都很敬重欧姆尼塞亚与祂的神甫。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal sketches a blessing in the air, and many of your subjects, wearing beatific smiles, copy it — technomats in grease-stained robes, bureaucrats scratching at scrolls with autoquill fingers, and aristocrats flaunting their costly {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g}. On a world as civilised as Dargonus there are many who honour the Omnissiah and His priests.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡在空中划着祝福的图案，你的众多臣民也面露微笑，有样学样地描画起来。他们之中有穿着油污长袍的机械殉道者，有挥舞着自动羽毛笔在卷轴上奋笔疾书的官员，还有有意炫耀着自己昂贵{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}的达官贵人。在达戈努斯这样的文明世界，许多人都很敬重欧姆尼塞亚与祂的祭司。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal traza una bendición en el aire y muchos de tus súbditos, con sonrisas beatíficas, la copian. Los tecnómatas con túnicas manchadas de grasa, los burócratas arañando pergaminos con plumas automáticas y los aristócratas haciendo ostentación de sus costosos {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}aumentos{/g}. En un mundo tan civilizado como Dargonus, son muchos los que honran al Omnissiah y a su clero.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal sketches a blessing in the air, and many of your subjects, wearing beatific smiles, copy it — technomats in grease-stained robes, bureaucrats scratching at scrolls with autoquill fingers, and aristocrats flaunting their costly {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g}. On a world as civilised as Dargonus there are many who honour the Omnissiah and His priests.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal traza una bendición en el aire y muchos de tus súbditos, con sonrisas beatíficas, la copian. Los tecnómatas con túnicas manchadas de grasa, los burócratas arañando pergaminos con plumas automáticas y los aristócratas haciendo ostentación de sus costosos {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}aumentos{/g}. En un mundo tan civilizado como Dargonus, son muchos los que honran al Omnissiah y a su clero.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal trace une bénédiction dans les airs et bon nombre de vos sujets l'imitent avec un sourire béat : technomates en tenues tachées de lubrifiant, bureaucrates grattant des parchemins avec leurs doigts autoplumes, aristocrates bardés d'{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g} hors de prix... Sur un monde civilisé comme Dargonus, beaucoup honorent l'Omnimessie et Ses prêtres.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal sketches a blessing in the air, and many of your subjects, wearing beatific smiles, copy it — technomats in grease-stained robes, bureaucrats scratching at scrolls with autoquill fingers, and aristocrats flaunting their costly {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g}. On a world as civilised as Dargonus there are many who honour the Omnissiah and His priests.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal trace une bénédiction dans les airs et bon nombre de vos sujets l'imitent avec un sourire béat : technomates en tenues tachées de lubrifiant, bureaucrates grattant des parchemins avec leurs doigts autoplumes, aristocrates bardés d'{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g} hors de prix... Sur un monde civilisé comme Dargonus, beaucoup honorent l'Omnimessie et Ses prêtres.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal zeichnet einen Segen in die Luft, und viele deiner Untertanen kopieren ihn mit entrücktem Lächeln – Technomaten in ölverschmierten Roben, Bürokraten, die mit Autofeder-Fingern auf Schriftrollen schreiben, und Aristokraten, die ihre kostspieligen {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Augmentationen{/g} präsentieren. Auf einer derart zivilisierten Welt wie Dargonus verehren viele den Omnissiah und seine Priester.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal sketches a blessing in the air, and many of your subjects, wearing beatific smiles, copy it — technomats in grease-stained robes, bureaucrats scratching at scrolls with autoquill fingers, and aristocrats flaunting their costly {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g}. On a world as civilised as Dargonus there are many who honour the Omnissiah and His priests.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal zeichnet einen Segen in die Luft, und viele deiner Untertanen kopieren ihn mit entrücktem Lächeln – Technomaten in ölverschmierten Roben, Bürokraten, die mit Autofeder-Fingern auf Schriftrollen schreiben, und Aristokraten, die ihre kostspieligen {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Augmentationen{/g} präsentieren. Auf einer derart zivilisierten Welt wie Dargonus verehren viele den Omnissiah und seine Priester.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, havada bir lütuf çiziyor. Bundan hoşnut kalan pek çok kul da onun yaptığını tekrar ediyor. Yağ lekeli cübbeleriyle teknomatlar, otoyazar parmaklarıyla parşömenleri tırmalayan bürokratlar ve pahalı {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogmentasyonlarıyla{/g} hava atan aristokratlar... Dargonus gibi medeni bir dünyada, Hermesih ile rahiplerini onurlandıran çok kişi var.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal sketches a blessing in the air, and many of your subjects, wearing beatific smiles, copy it — technomats in grease-stained robes, bureaucrats scratching at scrolls with autoquill fingers, and aristocrats flaunting their costly {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g}. On a world as civilised as Dargonus there are many who honour the Omnissiah and His priests.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal havada bir lütuf çiziyor ve hoşnut ifadelere sahip çoğu kulun kendisini kopyalıyor. Yağ lekeli cübbeleriyle teknomatonlar, otoyazar parmaklarıyla parşömenleri tırmalayan bürokratlar ve pahalı {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogmentasyon{/g}larıyla hava atan aristokratlar... Dargonus gibi medeni bir dünyada, Hermesih ile rahiplerini onurlandıran pek çok kişi var.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
